user_input: Hi I want to book a flight
expected_response: Sure! I can help you book a flight. Where would you like to fly from?
Great, New York. And where would you like to fly to?
New York to Los Angeles. When would you like to depart?
I have you flying on Friday. What class would you prefer - Economy, Business, or First Class?
Economy class selected. Let me search for available flights for you.

user_input: I want to check my order status
expected_response: Of course! Could you please provide your order number?
I found order #12345. Your order is currently being prepared and will ship within 24 hours.
Based on your location, you can expect delivery within 3-5 business days after shipping.
No problem! I can help you reset your password. What email address is associated with your account?
I've sent a password reset link to test@example.com. Please check your inbox.
We're open Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM Eastern Time. Is there anything else I can help you with?

user_input: I need to speak to a human
expected_response: I understand you'd like to speak with a human agent. Let me connect you to our support team.
Connecting you now. A support representative will be with you shortly. Your wait time is approximately 5 minutes.
Hello! Welcome to our service. How can I assist you today?
Goodbye! Thank you for using our service. Have a great day!
I'm sorry, I didn't quite understand that. Could you please rephrase your question?

user_input: Book a flight and check my order
expected_response: I can help with both. Which would you like to do first - book a flight or check your order status?
Order ABC123 status: Shipped. Now, would you like to book a flight?
